text: Henrico Drost (born 21 January 1987) is a Dutch footballer who plays as centre back for ASWH.https://www.voetbalprimeur.nl/nieuws/934153/aswh-verrast-en- maakt-komst-van-drost-33-bekend.html ==Club career== Born in Kampen, Drost started his career in 2005 with SC Heerenveen, where he was usually a bencher. Heerenveen loaned him out to Excelsior,Flitsende start Henrico Drost bij Excelsior - SC Heerenveen De GraafschapHenrico Drost maakt seizoen af bij De Graafschap - Voetbal International and VVV-Venlo.VVV huurt Henrico Drost - NU In the summer of 2010 Drost signed a two-year contract with RKC Waalwijk after leaving Heerenveen on a free transfer. In the summer of 2013, Drost signed with NAC Breda for two seasons,Henrico Drost verruilt RKC voor NAC Breda - NU to leave them for Excelsior on a free in 2015.Excelsior haalt transfervrije Drost - Voetbal International Drost returned to RKC in the Eerste Divisie in the summer of 2017.Henrico Drost is terug bij RKC Waalwijk - Brabants Dagblad In the summer of 2020, he switched to ASWH in the Tweede Divisie. ==Personal life== Henrico Drost is the twin brother of former professional football player Jeroen Drost.Jeroen en Henrico Drost vieren 19e verjaardag - SC Heerenveen ==Honours== ===Club=== Heerenveen *KNVB Cup: 2008–09 RKC Waalwijk: *Eerste Divisie: 2010–11 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:People from Kampen, Overijssel Category:Association football central defenders Category:Dutch footballers Category:Netherlands youth international footballers Category:Netherlands under-21 international footballers Category:SC Heerenveen players Category:SBV Excelsior players Category:De Graafschap players Category:VVV-Venlo players Category:RKC Waalwijk players Category:NAC Breda players Category:Eredivisie players Category:Eerste Divisie players Category:Twin people from the Netherlands Category:Twin sportspeople Category:ASWH players
title: Henrico Drost
